common_errors.cause: Source wasn't compiled with --coverage or .gcno file missing
common_errors.solution: Compile with: gcc --coverage -o prog prog.c (creates .gcno files)

common_errors.cause: Program wasn't run or .gcda file not generated
common_errors.solution: Run the compiled program first. It creates .gcda data files on execution.

common_errors.cause: gcov version differs from gcc version used to compile
common_errors.solution: Use matching gcov version: gcov-11 for code compiled with gcc-11

common_errors.cause: Source was recompiled but .gcda files are from old run
common_errors.solution: Delete old .gcda files. Recompile and re-run program.

common_errors.cause: gcov can't find original source file at recorded path
common_errors.solution: Run gcov from build directory. Use -s to specify source directory.

common_errors.cause: Source file contains no executable code or was optimized away
common_errors.solution: Check file has functions. Compile with -O0 to prevent optimization removal.
Delete .gcda files and re-run program. May be incomplete write.

common_errors.cause: Trying to merge incompatible coverage data (different builds)
common_errors.solution: Delete all .gcda files. Recompile everything and collect fresh coverage.

common_errors.cause: Coverage files from much newer/older gcov version
common_errors.solution: Match gcov to gcc version. Install appropriate gcov version.
Delete .gcda files and re-run. May indicate bug in very long-running program.
